hero.headline:
Basic Nuxt + PrimeVue stack
to get started faster
hero.subheadline: Integrated most important packages to work with Nuxt.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.desc: Utility-first styling with shared design tokens.

seo.desc: Sane defaults for sitemap, robots and other SEO needs.

image.title: Nuxt Image

posthog.title: PostHog
posthog.desc: Product analytics with event tracking, feature flags, and session replays.
